articles.author: Christian Borjon Valencia
articles.title: Gold price tumbles after hitting two-week high amid Fed rate cut speculation - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price reversed its course and tumbled almost 1% after hitting a two-week high of $2477 following weaker-than-expected data from the United States (US).
articles.content:
• Gold price drops to $2,420 after peaking at $2,477, down nearly 0.80%.
  • US Nonfarm Payrolls for July miss expectations, unemployment rate rises to 4.3%.
  • Treasury yields and USD… [+4041 chars]
